data.name: CommandStatusError
data.value: Device status code: 0x{0:X8} received.

data.name: BandTileNoSmallIcon
data.value: A BandTile must have a non-null SmallIcon property.

data.name: BandTilePageTemplateUnknownOrInvalidElementType
data.value: Invalid or unknown element type.

data.name: InvalidBarcodePdf417Data
data.value: Invalid Pdf417 data encountered. Some Band versions support a limited character set; see documentation for details.

data.name: RemoveTileFailed
data.value: Unable to remove the Tile '{0}' from the Band.

data.name: BandTilePageTemplateInvalidCheckDigit
data.value: Page template check digit mismatch.

data.name: BandTilePageDataInvalidElementChildCount
data.value: The data element count is invalid.

data.name: BandTilePageDataNullElementEncountered
data.value: Null page data elements are not allowed.

data.name: StreamWriteFailure
data.value: Cannot write data to the stream.

data.name: RemovePagesEmptyGuid
data.value: Unable to remove pages from Tile '{0}'.

data.name: SdkVersionNotSupported
data.value: This version of the SDK is no longer supported.

data.name: InvalidBarcodeCode39Data
data.value: Invalid Code-39 data encountered.

data.name: BarcodeDataTooLong
data.value: Value exceeds maximum barcode data length {0}.

data.name: NotificationFieldsEmpty
data.value: Both title and body are null or empty.

data.name: BandTileOwnedTileNameExceedsLength
data.value: A Band Tile name length exceeds that allowed by owned Tiles.

data.name: ByteWriteFailure
data.value: Cannot write the byte value to the stream.

data.name: BarcodeDataEmpty
data.value: Barcode data cannot be empty.

data.name: RemoveTileEmptyTileId
data.value: Removing a tile requires a non-empty Tile ID.

data.name: BandTilePageTemplateBlobTooBig
data.value: Page template byte count exceeds the maximum.

data.name: UnsupportedSensorInterval
data.value: Use of an unsupported reporting interval.

data.name: SensorUserConsentNotQueried
data.value: This sensor type requires explicit user consent. RequestUserConsentAsync() must be called one time prior to subscribing.

data.name: SetPagesEmptyGuid
data.value: Unable to set pages on Tile '{0}'.

data.name: EofExceptionOnWrite
data.value: An attempt was made to write beyond the end of the stream.

data.name: ConnectionAttemptFailed
data.value: Failed to connect to the target band.

data.name: BandTilePageTemplateNullElementEncountered
data.value: Null page template elements not not allowed.

data.name: BandTileEmptyName
data.value: A BandTile must have a non-empty Name property.

data.name: GenericNullCollectionElement
data.value: A null element was encountered

data.name: BandTilePageTemplateInvalidElementChildCount
data.value: The page template element count is invalid.

data.name: ImageDimensionPixelDataMismatch
data.value: Pixel data does not match width and height.

data.name: BandTileNullTemplateEncountered
data.value: Null page templates not allowed.

data.name: GenericLengthExceeded
data.value: {0} is too long.

data.name: InvalidAppAmount
data.value: Invalid amount of apps found on the device.

data.name: BandTilePageTemplateDuplicateElementOrId
data.value: A duplicate page element or element Id was encountered.

data.name: BandTileNoTileIcon
data.value: A BandTile must have a non-null TileIcon property.

data.name: MeTileImageWidthError
data.value: Me Tile image width must be {0}.

data.name: NotificationInvalidTileId
data.value: Tile ID is invalid.

data.name: DeviceInNonAppMode
data.value: The band is not running in App mode. Current Device Mode = {0}.

data.name: BandTileTooManyIcons
data.value: The page icon count exceeds the maximum.

data.name: BandAtMaxTileCapacity
data.value: The Band already has its maximum number of Tiles.

data.name: BandTileEmptyTileId
data.value: A BandTile must have a non-empty Tile ID.

data.name: BadDeviceCommandStatusPacket
data.value: Unexpected packet type encountered while reading command status packet.

data.name: OperationRequiredConnectedDevice
data.value: The attempted operation requires a connected band.

data.name: BandTileTooManyTemplates
data.value: The page template count exceeds the maximum.

data.name: BandTilePageTemplateUnexpectedElementType
data.value: Unexpected element type.

data.name: HeartRateSensorConsentPrompt
data.value: Allow this application to access the heart rate sensor on your Microsoft Band?

data.name: BandTileNameLengthExceeded
data.value: The Name property must be no greater than {0} characters.

data.name: StreamReadFailure
data.value: Cannot read data from the stream.

data.name: CargoCommandStatusUnavailable
data.value: CommandStatus is not available until all data has been transferred to/from the band.

data.name: UnsupportedSensor
data.value: Use of an unsupported sensor.

data.name: GenericCountZero
data.value: {0} must have at least one entry.

data.name: MeTileHeightHeightError
data.value: Me Tile image height must be {0}.
